warning: non-canonical string literal in `syntax` declaration
  --> testdata/parser/syntax/proto2_split.proto:15:10
   | 
15 | syntax = "proto" "2";
   |          ^^^^^^^^^^^ 
  help: replace it with a canonical string
   | 
15 | - syntax = "proto" "2";
15 | + syntax = "proto2";
   | 
   = note: Protobuf implicitly concatenates adjacent string literals,
   = note: like C or Python, which can lead to surprising behavior

 encountered  1 warning
